high.title: Multiple filter state management approaches
high.description: FilterContext manages both 'periodFilter' state and derived 'period' calculation, creating potential for state synchronization issues
high.remediation: Consolidate filter state management into a single source of truth

high.title: Conflicting period determination logic
high.description: Period type (MTD/QTD/YTD) is determined by selections but can conflict with explicit period setting
high.remediation: Implement clear hierarchy for period determination

medium.title: Multiple filter component implementations
medium.description: Found 15+ filter-related components including PeriodFilter, ModularPeriodFilter, StickyPeriodFilter, suggesting fragmented implementations
medium.remediation: Consolidate filter components into a single, configurable component

medium.title: Inconsistent filter parameter passing
medium.description: Services accept both individual parameters (year, period, month, quarter) and multiSelectParams object
medium.remediation: Standardize filter parameter interface across all services

low.title: Redundant filter validation logic
low.description: Filter validation spread across components instead of centralized
